DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate two different strategy withdrawal CPAP preterm infant bear 32 week gestation .
DOC.brief_title: Weaning Nasal Continuous Positive Airway Pressure ( CPAP ) Premature Infants
DOC.criteria: Gestational age < 32 week birth Current gestational age > 28+6 week Nasal CPAP > 24 hour Nasal CPAP pressure < 8 cmH2O Oxygen requirement < 30 % increase Respiratory rate < 70 per minute Less 3 episode oxygen saturation < 70 % heart rate < 70 beat per minute precede 24 hour Tolerates time CPAP care ( 15 minute ) Congenital malformation heart ( except patent ductus arteriosus , atrial septal defect patent foramen ovale ) , lung , gastrointestinal tract Surgical procedure perform gastrointestinal tract Known suspect congenital neuromuscular disease Known suspect syndrome
